name: Pixel Goodies
description:
Pixel goodies is farming simulator, tycoon game. Build your farm, plant seeds, grow your plants and sell them.

There are 5 types of workers with different jobs, some of them are in charge for tilling and sowing, while others do the harvesting and caring.  

Unlock new plants by leveling up, plant them as soon as possible, customers will want to buy them and it will make them angry if you don't have any!

Gain reputation by selling plants which will bring more customers to your farm, with higher reputation you can set higher selling prices. 

The more you go over acceptable price, more likely the sale will be unsuccessful and it will cost you losing reputation.

The game is in early access, any kind of feedback or recommendations are highly appreciated!

Next features:

  • Bigger map
  • Upgrades
  • More skins
  • Save game
